creator: iain.falconer@e-in.co.nz
text:
portInt=8007 - hardcoded in application code add does not seem to be overridden 
by configuration file settings ?

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
The "int portInt=8007;" sets the default.  It will be updated if a
Ajp12ConnectionHandler connector is found on the ContextManager, i.e.
"portInt=tcpCon.getPort();".  They are placed on the ContextManager via the
server.xml file.
